column5: Can Anyone pm me as to where I might be able to tell me where the Crappies are hitting , in and around Brantford? I'm doing it from shore, I wish I wasn't.

im in Brantford and have never caught a crappie from shore EVER. Good luck man I cant help out..Pm me if you wanna check out some of my Bass and waleye holes, when all opens up!! Id gladly take another out for a day of great fishin! be prepared to walk thou....
